 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶ֫כֶס‎</span>] **noun masculine**<sup>[[Josh.22.8|Josh 22:8]]</sup> only plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְכָסִים‎</span> ==riches, treasures== (probably Assyrian or Aramaic loan-word, compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nikâsu***</u></abbr>, ***property***, ***wealth***, ***gain***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 463</sup>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***wealth***; on derivation from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nikâsu***</u></abbr>, ***cut off***, ***hew down***, ***behead***, etc., Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***slay***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְכַס‎</span>, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָכַס‎</span> ***id.***, through meaning ***cattle for slaughter***, compare [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>98</sup> [[BDB#Hpt|Hpt]]<sup>Hebraica.iii</sup> (Jan.1887), 107 ff. [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 120f.</sup> [[BDB#Brock|Brock]]<sup>ad voc</sup>.); — [[Josh.22.8|Josh 22:8]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Chr.1.11|2Chr 1:11]]; [[2Chr.1.12|2Chr 1:12]]; [[Eccl.6.2|Eccl 6:2]] (all \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשֶׁר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּבוֺד‎</span>), [[Eccl.5.18|Eccl 5:18]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשֶׁר‎</span>).
